goal.ch: 介紹土木工程各專業領域，以及土木系課程與各項學術交流活動，邀請業界前輩進行經驗分享，初步體驗土木工程設計實務。 使學生瞭解土木工程相關實務內容與研究，提升對土木工程學習興趣與日後參與土木相關行業之意願。
goal.en: This course introduces the different fields of civil engineering and the academic activities of our department. It includes the shearing by the senior engineers and to experience a brief bridge design. The goals are to enhance their interest and to understand different fields of civil engineering.

outline.ch:
第一部分：各專業領域，以及土木系課程與各項學術交流活動
第二部分：專題演講
第三部分：紙橋設計製作競賽
outline.en:
1. Introduction of different fields of civil engineering
2. Lectures by senior engineers
3. Paper bridge competition

gradMethod.ch:
出席成績：20%
隨堂報告：40%
分組競賽成績：40%

flexDiscription.ch: 16週週間需額外進行紙橋競賽模型準備
flexDiscription.en: Additional working hours are necessary to prepare the paper bridge competition during the 16 weeks.

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限一年級。
en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:First Year only.
